ComicInfo.Summary:
There are many assassins in the known universe. This is the story of the most well-mannered one.
"Good manners is just being respectful of others. Whether you are paid to kill them or not, you should show respect for all people."
*Chapter Titles* Chapter Sixteen [Hide and Seek / Seek and Find] Chapter Seventeen [That's Not the Job] Chapter Eighteen [This Is the Job] *List of covers and their creators:* | Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | |-------|---------|-----------------|------------------| | A | Cover A | Mike Huddleston | 1-2 | | B | Cover B | Mike Huddleston | 3 |
ComicInfo.Title: Chapter Eighteen - This is the Job; Chapter Seventeen - That;s Not the Job; Chapter Sixteen - Hide And Seek / Seek And Find
